Text:
Thanks! :) Another great episode.

I heard that B&B didn't air to completion in many areas on Friday due to a news broadcast about a shooting in colorado. I hope you were still able to get it. :(

Anyway, thanks again! If I don't see you again later today with the show, see you monday! Have a great weekend!

So far I have only 5 minutes of the show...because of the news break...! But I´m working on getting the whole show...I hope I´ll be able to post it soon...!! Maybe tomorrow...but I´m really working on it...!! I hate when they do the news breaks during the soaps but it was a horrible shooting so it´s Ok I think...!!
